page.title: 10A Typical Modern Home
page.content: Our house is small, semi-detatched and brick built with a grey tiled roof.It has gas central heating and a very small garden. Both my parents work, but Mummy finishes at 3.30 pm so that she can pick me up from school and cook the evening meal.During the week we usually eat quickly prepared convenience food cooked in the microwave oven, but with fresh vegetables. On Sundays we often have a traditional roast dinner. In the evenings Mummy does some housework such as ironing, while I watch television and do my homework. Sometimes I go out to play on my roller skates or write to my brother who is at boarding school. Home is full of familiar objects, memories, smells, sounds and people. It is the place where we can relax together and talk.
